Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.shape.rectangle

Class RectangleEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.JavaFXEntity
      • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.shape.rectangle.RectangleEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Anchorable, Bounded, Entity, NodeProvider, Placeable, Removeable, Rotatable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, WithTimerList
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicRectangleEntity
    public abstract class RectangleEntity
extends JavaFXEntity
    A RectangleEntity provides the option to use a drawable Rectangle as an Entity.
